page.title: 09ABOUT OURSELVES BY CLASS 8.
page.content: Our ages in June 1985 range from 7 years and 9 months to 8 years and 8 months. Out of 10 girls in the class only one is left-handed. Weights range from 19kg. to 35kg. and heights from 1.20m. to 1.34m. Shoes range from 12 (small) to 1.5 (large). Four are Brownies, one a ballet dancer and one likes riding horses. Tastes in food range from prawn omelettes and chips to brown bread cheese sandwiches. {There are three left-handers amongst {the 16 boys. The smallest is 1.18m. {tall,weighs 21kg. and takes size 13 in {shoes. The tallest boy measures {1.36m.,weighs 32kg., and takes size 4 {in shoes. The most popular hobby is {playing football but others include {playing cricket, rounders, benchball, {tennis, darts, snooker, chess and {marbles, bird-watching and Cubs and {collecting stickers, stamps and soaps.
